::: Inferno, Rampage, and Black Aracnia rest peacefully in a CR tank, 
meanwhile, Hell Beast, and Jackle, along with the other Predacons prepare to 
defend there base. ::

:: Hell Beast ::: Vuloris! Get outside with your team and fight them! 
Scourge, Mosquitor, arm youselfs and join them!

::: Jackle ::: You do realize we are vastly outnumbered.

::: Hell Beast growls as he activated the external Autoguns and raises 
shileds. ::: Shut up, we will not let this base fall to a bunch of money 
hungry leeches!

::: Jackle ::: Should I call for MArine, Pheniox, Gremlin, and Transanulas?

::: Hell Beast ::: Marine and Gremlin are on there way...

::: On the view screen, Scourge, and now in the distance firing at Sixshot 
are Marine and Gremlin :::

::: Hell Beast, holding a chain gun ::: Excellent! Now lets get out there!

::: They run down the rampand take a few shots at Shuko and his dieties. :::

~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron looks at the completed tunnles ::: Good work, yes. I am very 
pleased with you work.

::: Waspinator limps inside, carring himself barely. ::: Waspinator hurt!

::: Megatron ::: Waht? Wheres Shredder? What happened?

::: Waspinator ::: Waspinator was going just like Megatron wanted, but 
Waspinator got shot!

::: Megatron slams his transmetal two T-rex foot down ::: Damn him! Get 
youself in a CR chamber! 

::: Megatron thinks for a moment and checks the scanners. Sure enough there 
is a battle brewing at the Predacon base. :::

::: Megatron ::: Ah, Waspinator! I have a much more important task for you!

~~~~~~~~

::: Transanulas throws another rock, bored out of his insane mind. Pheniox 
dose the same. :::

::: Pheniox ::: Do you think we'll be attacked?

::: Transanulas ::: I dont know, or care for that matter. 

::: Pheniox ::: Someones grumpy.

::: Transanulas ::: And someone is also starving. This assignment is totally 
unimportant! I say we reconstruct the tower into a wepon of mass destruction!

::: Pheniox ::: Really now?

::: Transanulas ::: Yes. It would use the smae basic principals. Instead of 
sending Energon radiation into comm systems, we can program the tower to send 
the radiation on a broadcast directly into a bats energy signiture.

::: Pheniox ::: ...So the energon would lock on to the person and basically...

::: Transanulas ::: It would kill them!

::: Pheniox, being the former leader of an Anti-maximal terrorist group likes 
the idea. ::: When do we start?

::: Transanulas picks up a tool box and begin to chuckle. :::

~~~~~~~`

::: Waspinator, barely held together, waits outside of the Newcomers ship. 
His mission was simple and clear. :::

::: Waspinator, in his beast mode, buzzed closer, until several auto-guns 
began to take notice, where apon he backed away. :::

::: Waspinator ::: Waspinator dont like this job!

::: Ra, in his firebird beast mode hovers behinde him ::: Waspinator will die!

::: Waspinator tkaes flight, without even looking to see who chasing him. He 
flys as fast and as far away from Ra as he can. Ra, though, follows him 
sending fireballs streaming past the bug. Soon, they are close to the 
mountian, where Megatron awaits. :::

::: Waspinator then dives down, and Ra follows laughing in what he belives to 
be his triumph. :::

::: Megatron ::: Now Ive got you....

::: Waspinator flys past Megatron, who pops up and fires one hit at Ra, 
sending him skidding to the ground. Both Predacons rush over to him. :::

::: Ra ::: ....W-whats are you doing?

::: Megatron ::: Winning the beast wars of course!

::: With that, Megatron injects Ra with a tranc, and they take him inside 
there base. :::
